metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7398 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A type confusion vulnerability in the merge_param() function of php_http_params.c in PHP's pecl-http extension 3.1.0beta2 (PHP 7) and earlier as well as 2.6.0beta2 (PHP 5) and earlier allows attackers to crash PHP and possibly execute arbitrary code via crafted HTTP requests.

criterions.comment: php-pecl-http package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
